sentences.en: Don't be so stingy with the butter.
Don't be so stingy with the money!
sentences.cn: 用钱不要那样小手小脚!

sentences.en: How can you be so stingy after what the Doctor has done for us?
sentences.cn: 医生为我们做了那么多事,你们还怎么能这么吝啬?

sentences.en: I didn't want to wear your tacky green dress anyhow, stingy!
sentences.cn: 无论如何,我不想穿你那寒酸的绿色礼服, 小气鬼!

sentences.en: I sometimes warm and tolerant and sometimes eventful stingy.
sentences.cn: 我有时温暖和宽容的,有时是多事的吝啬.

sentences.en: In the wake up at some point, stingy earphone, continue to tell!
sentences.cn: 在醒来的某个时刻, 拔了耳机, 继续熟睡!

sentences.en: It is strange that such a rich man should be so stingy.
sentences.cn: 说来真怪,这么有钱的人居然那么小气.

sentences.en: Mike would never buy us dinner. He is such a stingy person!
sentences.cn: 麦克决不会请我们吃晚餐的. 他是个小气鬼!

sentences.en: She tried to save money without being stingy.
sentences.cn: 她设法节约钱但不要显得小气.

sentences.en: She’s too stingy to give money to charity.
sentences.cn: 她很小气，不愿捐钱行善。

sentences.en: Stingy kids got sick, after the disease cured by taking medication.
sentences.cn: 吝啬鬼孩子得了病, 吃了药后病治好了.

sentences.en: The place was an all - night cafe owned by a bitter and stingy man called Leo.
sentences.cn: 这家咖啡店通宵营业,老板叫利奥,为人吝啬,满腹牢骚.

sentences.en: They wouldn't be so stingy about it.
sentences.cn: 他们对它不会那么小气了.

sentences.en: Well , we've no need for relatives who are such stingy, snobbish parvenus as that. "
sentences.cn: 这种鄙吝势利的暴发户, 咱们不希罕和他们做亲家. ”

sentences.en: Winston was not a stingy man.
sentences.cn: 温斯顿不是个小气之人。

words.tran_cn: 激烈的；刺人的；刺一样的
讽刺者；好讽刺人的人；有刺的动物；鸡尾酒
吝啬的，小气的；有刺的；缺乏的
